name: LAWTON FORT SILL CHAMBER OF COMMERCE
sampleDescriptions: Coordinating meetings between Client and Congressional representatives, Department of Transportation, and Department of Defense regarding base issues and yearly fly-in.
Monitoring proposed budgets for appropriations relevant to the base. Seeking funds to repair taxi and runways and control towers. FAA funding. Approval of funds for upgrades. Staff consolidations.
